Literature Review: The study of temperature gradients has been a long-standing area of research in various fields, including physics, chemistry, and biology. Nonlinear dynamics plays a crucial role in understanding the complex behavior of temperature gradients in different systems. This review aims to provide an overview of the current state of knowledge on the topic, focusing on the scaling properties of temperature gradients, convection, and thermophoresis.
